text: François-René-Auguste Mallarmé ( 25 February 1755 – 25 July 1835) was a French statesman of the French Revolution and a supporter of Napoleon Bonaparte and the French Empire. His life is of specific interest and President of the National Convention. Category:1755 births Category:1835 deaths Category:Politicians from Pays de la Loire Category:People from Nancy Category:Presidents of the National Convention
title: François René Mallarmé
